ygData.msgSnippet: Unitron/Koga Shuko/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor: The five robots came into the clearing, seeing Set and his men attacking, and the other people of their group

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

Unitron/Koga Shuko/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor:



The five robots came into the clearing, seeing Set and his men attacking, and 
the other people of their group shooting the Ark, they joined in quickly.


Unitron raised both of his laser rifles, firing three shots each at the Ark 
(a total of 6).

---

Hades raised his laser rifle, firing three bolts off at the Ark.

---

Anubis took out his missile launcher, firing a rocket off at the Ark.

---

Shuko fired two laser bolts from his rifle at two serpeate auotguns.

---

Serpentor cupped his mouth with one hand, taking out his plasma launcher with 
the other.  "I'M BACK YOU PILES OF SLAG!  TELL 'EM I SENT YOU WHEN YOU DIE!" 
he screamed to the Maximals firing a shot at the Ark.  (Plasma launcher = 
Rocket launcher that fires plasma energy instead of rockets)
